entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 p.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
